formula: G.f.: A(x) = (1 - 8*x)^(3/4).a(n) ~ -3/4*Gamma(1/4)^-1*n^(-7/4)*2^(3*n)*{1 + 21/32*n^-1 + ...}.a(n) = (-8)^n/(n*Beta(n, 7/4-n)) if n>0; a(0)=1. - C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 16 2004a(n) = 8^n*Sum_{k=0..n} ((-1)^k*binomial(k-1/4,k)*binomial(n+3/4,n-k)*binomial(n+k-1,n)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 18 2016a(n) = (-8)^n*Gamma(7/4)/(Gamma(7/4-n)*Gamma(n+1)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 18 2016
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=8^n*sum((-1)^k*binomial(k-1/4,k)*binomial(n+3/4,n-k)*binomial(n+k-1,n),k,0,n); /*  _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 18 2016 */(PARI) a(n) = 2^n*prod(k=0, n-1, 4*k-3)/n!; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 18 2016
author: Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org)
